definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

pinyin: man4 xing4 pi2 lao2 zheng4 hou4 qun2

sentences.english: So it's a kind of machine which take advantage of fatigue-fracture.
sentences.chinese: 因而，它是一種化害爲利，利用疲勞斷裂下料的機械。

sentences.english: Peppermint leaves are believed to relieve tiredness and nasal stuffiness.
sentences.chinese: 據信薄荷葉可以減輕疲勞和鼻塞。

sentences.english: After making some simplifying assumptions, this paper obtains the fatigue life of steel towers.
sentences.chinese: 在作了一些簡化假設後，得到了鋼塔架疲勞壽命。

sentences.english: Without this device, a lot of drivers would have very tired legs.
sentences.chinese: 沒有制動助力器那麼司機的腿會非常疲勞。

sentences.english: Dismiss, for example, “some niggles, some feelings of fatigue, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，比如去除“一些吹毛求疵，一些疲勞感”。

sentences.english: Symptoms of anaemia include general fatigue and lassitude.
sentences.chinese: 貧血症狀包括全身疲勞和睏乏。

sentences.english: Objective Discuss the anti-fatigue action of pseudo-ginsenoside GQ.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討僞人蔘皁苷GQ抗運動性疲勞的功效。

sentences.english: To obtain the local stress distribution of the K-tubular joint, sub-model was built and calculated.
sentences.chinese: 這是進行其上局部K型管節點疲勞強度分析的前提。

sentences.english: Do you have a good remedy for fatigued eyes?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有好的治療法可以治我疲勞的眼睛？

sentences.english: A simplified model for describing the initial fatigue quality (IFQ) of structural details is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出描述結構細節初始疲勞質量的簡化模型。

sentences.english: In this paper, the method for the calculation of surface fatigue strength of W N gears is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文探討了雙圓弧齒輪接觸疲勞極限的計算方法。

sentences.english: Thermal fatigue property of Ni-based infiltrated layer on copper substrate has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了銅基表面鎳基滲層的熱疲勞性能。

sentences.english: Some days I was too tied to get out of bed.
sentences.chinese: 有時候我太疲勞了以致於起不了牀。

sentences.english: I'm very tired from walking such a long way.
sentences.chinese: 走了這麼長的路後我感到很疲勞。

sentences.english: I kept laughing from Thursday till last night as the result of made me too exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在笑，從週四，直至昨晚的結果令我太疲勞。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to bring relief/to alleviate (a crisis)/to dull (a pain)
to ease (tension)/to relax/to cause sth to relax/to alleviate/relaxed/easy and unhurried/leisurely/soothing/mild (slope)
